/** * BioJava implementation for percentage of identity (PID). Although the * name of the method is percentage of identity, the DistanceMatrix contains * the fractional dissimilarity (D), computed as D = 1 - PID. *

* It is recommended to use the method * {@link DistanceMatrixCalculator#fractionalDissimilarity(MultipleSequenceAlignment)} * instead of this one. * * @param msa * MultipleSequenceAlignment * @return DistanceMatrix */
